thread.title: Tech shares surge in morning trade; Amazon, Microsoft up

title: Tech shares surge in morning trade; Amazon, Microsoft up
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
U.S. stocks headed sharply higher in morning trading Friday after several big-name technology companies reported strong quarterly earnings. ...
